body: pages 44- I won't do that again...,
Such cute art and story! Even if Yaoi is not my thing, this was a fun read!

I don't even like Yaoi all that much, but I have to say, this artstyle is genuinely beautiful, while it is very loose yet quite polished. Tho the composition aswell is very clean, varied and not cluttered at all. If you show the normal panels to someone they would never guess it is a doujin.
This is my favorite work by Shinachiku... Its just so cute and sweet. I hope they make a continuation some day
my heart when he cried.....

And @Moosie I agree with @Drago303 except that... you need to be prepared in case things don't go well, sometimes we need to learn to say goodbye, even for people we appreciate, that doesn't mean it's going to go bad but you must be ready for everything.
 I've been in that place before and it's shit, but you must do something to get out of there, so don't be afraid to tell him, he needs to know and it would just hurt more if you take too long to say it.

I must say that I really appreciate this kind of sweet and more realistic stories, the art is beautiful and I love the fact that they take time to develop characters and story even with this short format, overall really good quality work
Adorable, this artist is revolutionary, but I wish more sex were shown with a bit older ages.
Moosie I don't know how we can contact each other but I think we should talk. This doujin got my throb on and you're comment was the cherry on top.
wait.... THAT IS ACTUAL CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT?!?!? :O          IS THIS STILL HENTAI?!?!?

@Moosie awww.... that is so cute :3  don't worry about it. Most people overthink this kind of love relationship, but it is fine. You love him, doesn't matter in which way. You should just accept it. Try hinting at what you feel for him, if you can't just say it. When you feel you should, confess to him. If he feels the same, great! If he doesn't, great too! Because, afterall, you two are great friends, and that is what matters   ^-^ And, if you two eventually end up in a relationship, you two will just figure it out. It all comes from experience. If, after some time, one of you or you two decide you should break up, it is fine too. Remember: above everything else is your friendship with him, that is something you can never afford to lose, no matter what :3
This was some good shit.

Please help, for the majority of my life I have had a problem where I could never fap, I never had any sexual attractions to anything, up until my second year in highschool where a friend recommend hentai, I tried fapping to the normal type, then experimented with all sorts of tags, even beastiality, which I did not enjoy, no offense if you like it tho, but none could get me hard, and so one day I stumbled upon some yaoi and decided to try it, I was confussed at first, but then I read another yaoi doujin, and...... I got hard, I realized that I was homo, but also realized my feelings towards that friend, we're currently entering our 3rd year in highschool, and I have no clue what to do about my feelings for him, I'll post my story here, in hopes that someone can help, but I'm sure most of the replies will be from trolls.
What a great story, its adorable and lovely.
